page.title: 12Where do we work ?
page.content: We prepared a survey of sixty five families living in{Hampton-in-Arden.} We wanted to find out the distances which people travelled to their place of work. Two thirds of those surveyed travelled to work by{car,}one sixth used the{train.}One person travelled regularly by{boat}and{aeroplane.}The remainder were able to{walk}to{work.} Approximately one third of the people asked travelled twelve miles to {Birmingham.}One eighth travelled ten miles to{Coventry.}One quarter worked within a six mile radius of Hampton- in -Arden. Four people travelled regularly in excess of sixty miles, one of these journeying to{Europe.}We concluded that the majority of people whom we surveyed worked within a twelve mile radius of Hampton-in-Arden and travelled to work by car or train.
